name: Soba's Gunpaw
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Mouse Only Option;Save Anytime;Family Sharing
description: Soba’s Gunpaw is a Short Incremental - Bullet Heaven game. Destroy everything, collect resources, then choose upgrades from a massive skill tree! Can be completed in under 4 hours.

name: Monster Slayer: Motion Edition
description: Monster Slayer: Motion Edition - VR-free motion gaming! Use any webcam (720p+) to control 3 classes (Archer/Ninja/Mage) with real movements. Smash chests for buffs. 12-level campaign & endless mode. AI motion tracking, auto-difficulty, 2m² play area.

name: Project 7: Escape Room
description: An escape room inspired adventure. Play as an investigator exploring the mysterious disappearance of a physicist involved in a secretive experiment known as Project 7. Explore the mansion, observe carefully, and use your puzzle-solving skills to uncover the truth behind Dr. Hillman's vanishing.

name: EoW: Willer's Dominion
description: Willer's Dominion is a TPS rogue-lite action game where you unlock and upgrade weapons, master new skills, shape your build through powerful perks, and face the growing risk of corrupted items as you grow stronger with each run. Reclaim your will before the Eye’s curse consumes what’s left of you.

name: Dust and Shadow
description: Dust and Shadow lets you shift between multiple time dimensions, altering the map in real time. Face enemies, traps, and the environment to uncover the mystery. Unlock powerful abilities as you progress through the adventure.

name: Invokyr
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;Adjustable Text Size;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Subtitle Options;Family Sharing
description: A forgotten board game. A haunted house. Play with up to 4 friends. Roll the dice, survive the horrors that are summoned, and beat the Gamemaster to win your freedom.

name: Drunk But Not Wasted Knight
description: A tipsy tale of questionable choices, suspiciously charming strangers, and conversations that unravel faster than your sobriety. What begins as a harmless chat in the alley might end with truffle mushrooms, a missing crown, or waking up in someone else’s dungeon. You’ve been warned.

name: TIH
genres: Free To Play;Animation & Modeling;Audio Production;Video Production;Early Access
description: TIH is the ONLY Avatar Streaming Solution that lets you use your camera for full-body and face motion tracking, no suits or sensors needed. Stream 3D avatars in cartoon or realistic styles, create avatars from your photo, manage AI NPCs, and produce video podcasts with up to four avatars!

name: Dungeon Cleaners Demo
categories: Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;Game demo;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound

name: Apoclone
description: Apoclone is a post-apocalyptic idle strategy RPG where you command a squad of clone warriors and unleash powerful mechs in turn-based combat. Strategize your formation, conquer enemies in PvE and PvP, and thrive in a ruined world—even while offline.

name: Axe or Bone
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Family Sharing
description: Axe or Bone is a Diablo-style action RPG where you embody six distinct heroes, plunge into six brutal campaigns, and conquer progressively lethal levels until claiming ultimate victory.
supported_languages: *;, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean;*

name: Mazgeon Soundtrack
description: Listen to the original soundtrack made for Mazgeon: Composed by Derwin Castillo. Collaboration artists Carlos Jimenez and Jesus Quintero.

name: TinyRealm
description: TinyRealm is a stylized survival game where you play as a toy in a giant world. Scavenge scraps, build your base, craft weapons, and survive against bugs, animals, plants, and hostile toys—alone or with friends in online co-op.

name: Just Keep Digging Soundtrack
description: The soundtrack for Just Keep Digging

name: Underneath
description: UNDERNEATH is a fast-paced, stylized Metroidvania game centered in a poor, underground city. Collect loot, explore an expansive urban wasteland, engage with fascinating characters, and make choices that will affect how Emma's story will end--for better or worse.

name: 血战沙城·王者归来
description: This is a casual game. Players need to click the mouse to earn in-game currency for upgrades. The game allows players to experience the journey from having nothing to having everything, and to live the life of a winner in life.

name: Silver Career
description: The game takes place in a fantasy world called "Twati". You will watch a mysterious character named "Otti" and "Anna" meet gods with different personalities and abilities on a free journey, and work with them to defeat powerful enemies and find their lost girlfriends.

name: Arcana Famiglia -La storia della Arcana Famiglia- Rinato
description: This is a story of destiny and bonds centered around Felicita, the daughter of the boss of Arcana Famiglia, an organization on a small island that possesses mysterious powers.

name: SlapCats
description: A party game that supports up to 4 players playing on the same screen. You will control cats in a paper world and win by defeating other players. Proficient use of different skills will make your little cat claws more effective!

name: Enlarge your Eggplant
description: A very serious game about the HARDship and struggle of farming. Grow your eggplant, make it bigger than any other, and ridicule your neighbor Jean-Michel.

name: Cosmic Coop Demo
categories: Single-player;Game demo;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Adjustable Text Size;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Stereo Sound
description: Attract cute Critterlings, build a thriving garden, craft decorations, and relax in a cozy, creature-collecting farming sim. Grow crops, design your farm your way, and watch adorable visitors bring your peaceful world to life.

name: Terrifying Tales: Watcher’s Point
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound
description: Harper Jones is missing. In a last-ditch attempt to find him, Sheriff Oaklyn heads out to the forest surrounding the infamous Watcher’s Point to investigate. But she soon finds herself experiencing the unsettling nature of the forest, one snapshot at a time, when she discovers an abandoned camera.

name: That Friday again
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Family Sharing
description: Medieval Ukraine. With black humor, pagan gods, and endless Fridays. You are a former king. Having quarreled with the gods, you lost everything and are stuck in a curse. From now on, you are forced to live the same day forever. Find a way to escape, or you'll be stuck in this cycle forever.

name: Summoners War: Rush
description: Summoners War: Rush is an idle tower defense RPG where you collect and strengthen your Monsters to build a team and defeat waves of enemies! Fight increasingly powerful foes across Stage Mode and Tower Defense Mode. Build your ultimate team and dominate every challenge!

name: Island of Ruin
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: You wake up on a decaying island. "Island of Ruin" is a puzzle novel game where you collect memory cores hidden on the island to uncover the mystery behind what happened there.

name: Glitch & Glory: Tales of Honeywood
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: Glitch and Glory: Tales of Honeywood is a parody RPG where you, an adventurer, tackle absurd quests in a satirical MMORPG world. Save sheep, negotiate with ghosts, and avoid fines. Sarcastic dialogue, impactful choices, and retro graphics await!

name: Hear The Bell Toll
description: A roguelike city-building game focused on short satisfying runs. Buy unique buildings from a shop, place them strategically and manage class synergies and statuses carefully to meet the tribute requirements and survive for 25 years!

name: StingerEP1
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Family Sharing
description: "StingerEP1" is an omnidirectional shooting game whose aim is to complete missions using the Stinger, the latest fighter in outer space.

name: Cat With Gun
